tool_description: Creates initial design layouts and specifications for woodworking projects based on project type, dimensions, and style preferences.

project_type.description: Type of project such as table, chair, cabinet, bookshelf, box, bench

error_messages: Invalid project type: Use supported types like table, chair, cabinet, bookshelf, box, or bench
Invalid dimensions: All dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 0
Unrealistic dimensions: Check that dimensions are reasonable for the project type
Unsupported style: Use styles like modern, traditional, rustic, or contemporary
usage: Specify the project type and three main dimensions. Optionally set a style preference. The tool generates a basic design layout with component specifications.

component_names.description: List of main components needed for the project

estimated_complexity.description: Complexity rating of beginner, intermediate, or advanced

primary_joinery_needs.description: Types of joints that will likely be needed
